concat_columns

babydragon.utils.hf_datasets.concat_columns(example, index=None)[source]

extract_values_and_embeddings_hf

babydragon.utils.hf_datasets.extract_values_and_embeddings_hf(dataset, value_column, embeddings_column)[source]

Extract values and embeddings from a Hugging Face dataset.

Parameters:

  • dataset (Dataset) – The Hugging Face dataset to extract values and embeddings from.

  • value_column (str | List[str]) – The column(s) of the dataset to use as values.

  • embeddings_column (str | None) – The column name containing the embeddings.

Returns:

one with the extracted values and one with the extracted embeddings (if any).

Return type:

A tuple containing two lists

extract_values_hf

babydragon.utils.hf_datasets.extract_values_hf(dataset, value_column)[source]

Extract values from a Hugging Face dataset.

Parameters:

  • dataset (Dataset) – The Hugging Face dataset to extract values from.

  • value_column (str | List[str]) – The column(s) of the dataset to use as values.

Returns:

A list with the extracted values.

Return type:

List[str]
